title: Liars Like Me
description: Valerie thought that she and Adam would spend the rest of their lives together. As children they were inseparable but time passes and as they say, all good things must come to an end. The secrets that Valerie must protect pull her further and further from home, and when Adam is diagnosed with cancer, she tries to run without looking back. Now, Valerie has moved thousands of miles away from the people who love her most. When she receives an eerie text message and Adam's condition worsens, she is forced to return to her old town. But when she arrives, some things have made... unexpected changes. And others are entirely too familiar.
author: Sabrina Aleman
